    • AnimateService

    Interface AnimateService

    Public-facing animation orchestration API.

    This is the service used by higher-level code to:

    • register lifecycle callbacks (on/off)
    • issue animations (enter, leave, addClass, animate, …)
    • control global/element-level enabling
    • cancel running work

    The service returns AnimateRunner instances for all animation requests.

    interface AnimateService {
        addClass(
            element: Element,
            className: string,
            options?: AnimationOptions,
        ): AnimateRunner;
        animate(
            element: Element,
            from: Record<string, string | number>,
            to: Record<string, string | number>,
            className?: string,
            options?: AnimationOptions,
        ): AnimateRunner;
        cancel(runner: AnimateRunner): void;
        enabled(element?: Element, enabled?: boolean): boolean;
        enter(
            element: Element,
            parent?: Element | null,
            after?: Element,
            options?: AnimationOptions,
        ): AnimateRunner;
        leave(element: Element, options?: AnimationOptions): AnimateRunner;
        move(
            element: Element,
            parent: Element | null,
            after?: Element,
            options?: AnimationOptions,
        ): AnimateRunner;
        off(event: string, container?: Element, callback?: Function): void;
        on(
            event: string,
            container: Element,
            callback?: (
                element: Element,
                phase: string,
                data: AnimationEventData,
            ) => void,
        ): void;
        pin(element: Element, parentElement: Element): void;
        removeClass(
            element: Element,
            className: string,
            options?: AnimationOptions,
        ): AnimateRunner;
        setClass(
            element: Element,
            add: string,
            remove: string,
            options?: AnimationOptions,
        ): AnimateRunner;
    }

    addClass

    • addClass(
          element: Element,
          className: string,
          options?: AnimationOptions,
      ): AnimateRunner

      Class-based animation: add classes to element.

      Parameters

      • element: Element
      • className: string
      • Optionaloptions: AnimationOptions

      Returns AnimateRunner

    animate

    • animate(
          element: Element,
          from: Record<string, string | number>,
          to: Record<string, string | number>,
          className?: string,
          options?: AnimationOptions,
      ): AnimateRunner

      Inline-style animation: animate from from styles to to styles.

      className may be applied during the animation to help CSS-based drivers.

      Parameters

      • element: Element
      • from: Record<string, string | number>
      • to: Record<string, string | number>
      • OptionalclassName: string
      • Optionaloptions: AnimationOptions

      Returns AnimateRunner

    cancel

    • cancel(runner: AnimateRunner): void

      Cancel a running animation by runner.

      Parameters

      • runner: AnimateRunner

      Returns void

    enabled

    • enabled(element?: Element, enabled?: boolean): boolean

      Enable/disable animations globally or for a specific element.

      • Called with no args: returns global enabled state.
      • Called with element: returns enabled state for that element.
      • Called with element + boolean: sets enabled state for that element.

      Parameters

      • Optionalelement: Element
      • Optionalenabled: boolean

      Returns boolean

    enter

    • enter(
          element: Element,
          parent?: Element | null,
          after?: Element,
          options?: AnimationOptions,
      ): AnimateRunner

      Structural animation: insert element into the DOM.

      Parameters

      • element: Element
      • Optionalparent: Element | null
      • Optionalafter: Element
      • Optionaloptions: AnimationOptions

      Returns AnimateRunner

    leave

    • leave(element: Element, options?: AnimationOptions): AnimateRunner

      Structural animation: remove element from the DOM.

      Parameters

      • element: Element
      • Optionaloptions: AnimationOptions

      Returns AnimateRunner

    move

    • move(
          element: Element,
          parent: Element | null,
          after?: Element,
          options?: AnimationOptions,
      ): AnimateRunner

      Structural animation: move element within the DOM.

      Parameters

      • element: Element
      • parent: Element | null
      • Optionalafter: Element
      • Optionaloptions: AnimationOptions

      Returns AnimateRunner

    off

    • off(event: string, container?: Element, callback?: Function): void

      Remove a previously registered callback.

      If only event is provided, removes all callbacks for that event. If container and/or callback are provided, filters removals accordingly.

      Parameters

      • event: string
      • Optionalcontainer: Element
      • Optionalcallback: Function

      Returns void

    on

    • on(
          event: string,
          container: Element,
          callback?: (
              element: Element,
              phase: string,
              data: AnimationEventData,
          ) => void,
      ): void

      Register an animation callback for a given event name on a container.

      Callbacks fire for matching descendant elements during queue execution phases.

      Parameters

      • event: string
      • container: Element
      • Optionalcallback: (element: Element, phase: string, data: AnimationEventData) => void

      Returns void

    pin

    • pin(element: Element, parentElement: Element): void

      Pin an element to a host parent for animation ancestry checks.

      This is used when the DOM parent relationship is not the effective “animation host” relationship (e.g. transclusion/moves).

      Parameters

      • element: Element
      • parentElement: Element

      Returns void

    removeClass

    • removeClass(
          element: Element,
          className: string,
          options?: AnimationOptions,
      ): AnimateRunner

      Class-based animation: remove classes from element.

      Parameters

      • element: Element
      • className: string
      • Optionaloptions: AnimationOptions

      Returns AnimateRunner

    setClass

    • setClass(
          element: Element,
          add: string,
          remove: string,
          options?: AnimationOptions,
      ): AnimateRunner

      Class-based animation: add and remove classes as a single atomic operation.

      Parameters

      • element: Element
      • add: string
      • remove: string
      • Optionaloptions: AnimationOptions

      Returns AnimateRunner
